recipe_name: Carpaccio of tuna and tomato with lime and sesame
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the olive oil, lemon and lime juice and balsamic vinegar into a bowl and mix well. Add the tuna to the bowl and let the fish marinate in the bowl for ten minutes. To serve, arrange the tomato slices on a clean plate and place the tuna on top of the tomato. Sprinkle the fresh parsley and sesame seeds over the top and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
